summary: Config for local-nas, a storage server with ZFS pools, MinIO, Prometheus monitoring, and VPN.
notes: Imports base, hardware, enable-wg, zram, zfs. Prometheus with fqdn johnbargman.net, listen-addr 10.88.127.3. MinIO insecure. Neovim, emacs, sshd. Secrix WireGuard secret wg_local-nas. VPN enable postfix 3, private key. Networking: useDHCP false, enp0s31f6/wlp4s0 DHCP. Boot: systemd-boot, sysctl inotify max 1048576, EFI, ZFS supported, extra pools archive/bulk-storage. ZFS auto scrub/trim/snapshot flags -k -p --utc. Systemd mounts bind /archive/general to /bulk-storage/NAS-ARCHIVE/ARCHIVE, /archive/astral to remote.worker/Astralship Master Archive/ARCHIVE, /archive/personal to 88/88-FS-V2/ARCHIVE, after zfs-mount. GC automatic false. Host ID d5710c9a, timezone UTC. NetworkManager applet.
reasoning: Core infrastructure for NAS operations, managing large ZFS storage pools with snapshots and scrubbing for data integrity. Integrates object storage via MinIO, monitoring with Prometheus, VPN access for security. High impact for data storage, backup, and remote access in the network.
